title: How to Make Low Fat and Crustless Pumpkin Pie

steps.headline: Get your oven preheated to 425 F.
In a huge bowl, combine the first five ingredients and stir them with a whisk.
steps.description: Keep stirring until well combined. Be sure you're working with pure pumpkin, not using a can of filling for pumpkin pie.

steps.headline: Transfer this mixture to a dish that the pie will be baked in.
steps.description: Make sure the dish you're using is resistant to your oven, and it can be any size.

steps.headline: Place the pie in the oven and allow it 15 min.
Reduce the heating condition of the oven to 350 °F (177 °C).
steps.description: Cook it until you can put a toothpick in the middle of the pie, and remove it with nothing on it.

steps.headline: Carefully remove the pie from the oven and allow it to cool for a few minutes.
steps.description: Then allow it to cool off, refrigerated, until set and cooled entirely. Add any whipped topping to your pie (such as whipped cream) and serve.

text: Get your oven preheated to 425 F.  In a huge bowl, combine the first five ingredients and stir them with a whisk. Keep stirring until well combined. Be sure you're working with pure pumpkin, not using a can of filling for pumpkin pie. Transfer this mixture to a dish that the pie will be baked in. Make sure the dish you're using is resistant to your oven, and it can be any size. Place the pie in the oven and allow it 15 min. to bake. Reduce the heating condition of the oven to 350 °F (177 °C). Cook it until you can put a toothpick in the middle of the pie, and remove it with nothing on it. Carefully remove the pie from the oven and allow it to cool for a few minutes. Then allow it to cool off, refrigerated, until set and cooled entirely. Add any whipped topping to your pie (such as whipped cream) and serve.
